name: Happy Triple Elimation: Programming Algorithm
description:
Happy Triple Elimination: Programming Algorithm Tempest(tar118@pitt.edu)

A game to teach players what algorithm practice looks like.

A Match 3 casual game.

Hope you enjoy the HAPPY ELIMINATING and learn some algorithm knowledge.

You can try it online here

(HTTPS may not work) link

The downloadable file is for Windows.

Players
  • Everyone who is interested in programming!
  • Everyone who is obsessed with happy eliminating, finds the triplet!s
Purpose Transform

Through this game, you may learn how to solve algorithm problems in programming and feel how difficult it is to solve them.

Barriers

Players may not be interested in algorithms, programming, and triplet elimination.

Game Impact

The happiness players feel

(maybe the spread on the social networks)

Scenarios

Players find the triple same elements in a space structure to eliminate them with a limited stack to store extra elements.

In this process, there is a window to show the code panel and teach players some practical programming knowledge to solve questions.

Features & TODO
  •  Body: Using this finding triple icons game to solve the problem and learn the algorithm
  •  Generate the Puzzle with Spatial Structure
  •  A background generated by Stable Diffusion
  •  The Audio for clicking and eliminating
  •  Background music and dancing gif
  •  Items: Refresh and Revision, to help players pass
  •  Triple Match reward, a refresh, or a revision chance
  •  Complete codes with player's progress to eliminate triplets
  •  Display the problem description and code panel.
  •  Display the problem tag.
  •  Winner: winner popup modal animation to show you wined
  •  Failure: fail popup modal animation to show you failed
  •  Endless Mode: After the first 10 levels, players can choose the endless mode to enjoy a happy eliminating game. There are at most 100 levels.
  •  Support mobile devices
  •  Configurable levels of information and expandability
